entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
